commands.uploadAllNewEditedNote: Refresh published and upload new notes

checkValidity.name: Test the connection to the configured repository

inRepo.error403: Error 403: this action is forbidden for {{repoInfo}}.

inBranch.error404: Error 404: The branch {{branchInfo}} was not found in {{repoInfo}}.

checkValidity.repoExistsTestBranch: Repository {{repoOwner}}/{{repoName}} exists. Now testing the {{main}} branch.

deletion.defaultFolder: You need a default folder name in the settings to use this command.
deletion.rootFolder: You need to configure a root folder in the settings to use this command.

apiType.title: API Type
apiType.desc: Choose between the Github API or the Github Enterprise API (only Github Enterprise users — Advanced user!).

hostname.title: Github Enterprise Hostname
hostname.desc: The hostname of your Github Enterprise instance.

repoName.title: Repository Name
repoName.desc: The name of the repository where you store your blog.

ghToken.desc: A github token with repository permission. You can generate it
ghToken.title: Github Token

branch.title: Main branch
branch.desc: If you use a different main branch than "main", you can specify it here.

folderBehavior.title: Folder behavior
folderBehavior.desc: Choose between a fixed folder, the value of a frontmatter key or your obsidian relative path.

pathRemoving.title: API Type
pathRemoving.desc: Allow to publish only subfolder by removing the path before that :

frontmatterKey.title: Frontmatter key
frontmatterKey.desc: Set the key where to get the folder's value.

rootFolder.title: Root folder
rootFolder.desc: Append this path to the folder set by the frontmatter key

useFrontmatterTitle.title: Set the key where to get the value of the filename
useFrontmatterTitle.desc: Use a frontmatter value to generate the filename. By default, "title" is used.

frontmatterRegex.desc: If the text is between "//", it will be used as a regex. Otherwise, it will be used as a string.

filepathRegex.desc: If the text is between "//", it will be used as a regex. Otherwise, it will be used as a string. The replacement won't be applied to the filename.

conversion.title: Content's conversion
conversion.desc: Theses option won't change the content of the file in your Obsidian Vault, but will change the content of the file in Github.

hardBreak.title: Markdown hard line break
hardBreak.desc: Add a markdown hard line break (double whitespace) after each line. This settings can be overridden by the frontmatter key "hardbreak".

links.title: Links
links.desc: You can prevent links to be converted and keep the alt text (or filename) by using the frontmatter key "links" with the value "false".

internals.title: Internals Links
internals.desc: Convert the internal link in shared file to match the folder settings

wikilinks.title: [[Wikilinks]]
wikilinks.desc: Convert Wikilinks to MDlinks, without changing the contents. This option can be overridden by the frontmatter key "mdlinks".

folderNote.title: Folder note
folderNote.desc: Rename files to a specified name (default: index.md) if it has the same name as their parent folder/category (also works if the note is outside of the folder).

nonShared.title: Convert internal links pointing to unshared files
nonShared.desc: Convert internal links pointing to a non shared file to their counterpart in the website, with relative path. Disabled, the plugin will keep the filename.

censor.title: Replacement on:

modal.title: Text replacer
modal.desc: Replace text (or regex) in the file with the given value

censor.edit: Edit the parameters (flags and running order)

flags.title: Flags (based on JS regex and can be combined):

censor.empty: Replacement can be empty to remove the whole string.

MomentReplaceRegex.desc: Choose when the regex will be executed : before or after the other conversion (dataview, internal links...).

dataview.title: Dataview
dataview.desc: Convert dataview to markdown. This settings can be overridden by the frontmatter key "dataview".

tags.title: Convert frontmatter/dataview field into tags
tags.desc: This will convert any frontmatter or dataview inline field into frontmatter tags. Separate fields with a comma.

exclude.title: Exclude value from conversion
exclude.desc: This will exclude value from being converted. Separate fields with a comma.

inlineTags.title: Inline tags
inlineTags.desc: Add your inline tags in your frontmatter tags field and converting nested tags with replacing "/" with "_"

transferImage.title: Transfer attachments
transferImage.desc: Send attachments embedded in a file to github. This option can be overridden by the frontmatter key "attachment".

transferNotes.title: Transfer embedded notes
transferNotes.desc: Send embedded notes in a shared file to github. Only shared files will be send! This option can be overridden by the frontmatter key "embed".

defaultImageFolder.title: Default attachment folder
defaultImageFolder.desc: To use a folder different from default

transferMetaFile.title: Send files using a metadata field
transferMetaFile.desc: Set the names of the metadata field you want to use to send files. Separate fields with a comma. Dataview inline field are supported.

githubAction.title: Github action name
githubAction.desc: If you want to activate a github action when the plugin push the file, set the name of the file (in your .github/worfklows folder).

autoCleanUp.title: Auto clean up
autoCleanUp.desc: If the plugin must remove from github the removed files (stop share or deleted)

excludedFiles.title: Excluded files
excludedFiles.desc: If you want to exclude some folder from the auto clean up, set their path.

useMetadataExtractor.title: Metadata-extractor files
useMetadataExtractor.desc: Send the files generated by the metadata-extractor plugin in this folder.

prRequest.title: Commit message
prRequest.desc: The message send when the pull-request is merged. Will always followed by the pull-request number.

shareKey.title: Share Key
shareKey.desc: The frontmatter key to publish your file on the website.

excludedFolder.title: Excluded Folder
excludedFolder.desc: Never publish file in these folder, regardless of the share key. Separate folder name by comma.

fileMenu.title: File Menu
fileMenu.desc: Add an sharing commands in the file menu

editorMenu.title: Editor Menu
editorMenu.desc: Add a sharing commands in the right-click menu

copyLink.title: Copy link
copyLink.desc: Send a link to your note in your clipboard

baselink.title: Base link
baselink.desc: The base link of your website. By default : https://username.github.io/repo/

linkpathremover.title: Remove link part
linkpathremover.desc: Remove this part from the created links. Separate by comma if multiple value must be removed.

logNoticeHeader.title: Notice every error
logNoticeHeader.desc: On mobile, it can be hard to debug the plugin. Enable this option to log every error in a Notice.

shareExternalModified.title: Share external modified file
shareExternalModified.desc: Send edited file if they are different from the active file. Useful when editing metadata using MetaEdit or Metadata Menu.

frontmatter.title: Frontmatter keys cheatsheet
frontmatter.desc: Moreover, there are some frontmatter YAML keys that can be usefull for your workflow. The YAML code below show the default settings, but feel free to change it to your needs in each notes!
frontmatter.share: This key is used to share a note with the plugin.
frontmatter.mdlinks: Convert all wikilinks to markdown links

convert.enableOrDisable: Enable or disable the conversion of links. Disabling this will remove the
convert.syntax: syntax, while keeping the file name or the alternative text.

frontmatter.internals: Convert internals links to their counterpart in the website, with relative path. Disabled, the plugin will keep the internal link as is.
frontmatter.nonShared: Convert internal links pointing to a non shared file to their counterpart in the website, with relative path. Disabled, the plugin will keep the filename.

embed.remove: Remove the embed from the note, leaving empty line.

attachment.folder: Change the default folder for the attachments

frontmatter.hardBreak: Convert all linebreaks to markdown «hard break».

repo.desc: Change the default repo for the note.

frontmatter.titleKey: Change the title of the note.
frontmatter.baselink: Change the base link for the copy link command

multiRepoHelp.title: Send to multiple repository
multiRepoHelp.desc: If you want to send your notes to multiple repository, you can use the
multiRepoHelp.desc2: key in your frontmatter. The value of this key must be a list of repository. Each repository must have the following keys
multiRepoHelp.exampleDesc: The YAML code below show an example based on your settings.

informations.scanningRepo: Scanning the repository, may take a while...
informations.waitingWorkflow: Now, waiting for the workflow to be completed...

error.unablePublishNote: Unable to upload note {{file}}, skipping it
error.unablePublishMultiNotes: Unable to upload multiple notes, something went wrong.
error.mergeconflic: Pull-request is not mergeable, you need to do it manually.
error.errorConfig: Error configuring {{repoInfo}}. Please check your settings.
error.dataview: Unable to render dataview query. Please update the dataview plugin to the last version.

import.title: Import
import.desc: Import settings from text or a file. Note : this will overwrite your current settings (except for username, repo name and token).

export.title: Export
export.desc: Export settings to clipboard or a file.

branch.alreadyExists: Branch already exists ({{branchName}} on {{repoInfo}} - Using it.
